title: Best of The Herd: 04/11/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 04/11/2019
description:
Colin thinks LeBron James made it clear that Dwayne Wade is his true family by attending his farewell game rather than helping put out the Lakers fire. He believes Dirk Nowitzki would be drafted number one over Dwayne Wade. He says the Browns fans are great but still don’t hold a candle to the Steelers. And, Magic isn’t handling his first basketball failure well.  Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
